SENT.plain: Basing on own observations by the authors in 10 patients with angiodysplasia and circumscribed gigantism of an extremity, typical phlebographic and arteriographic findings are described
Classification of the angiodysplasia of the Klippel-Trenaunay and F
Weber type is in accordance with suggestions advanced in recent literature
The x-ray methods required for the purpose of establishing the diagnosis, are described
